name: DataTypes

DataTypes
description:
Google::Spanner::V1

Class Description
Google::Spanner::V1::BeginTransactionRequest The request for BeginTransaction.
Google::Spanner::V1::CommitRequest The request for Commit.
Google::Spanner::V1::CommitResponse The response for Commit.
Google::Spanner::V1::CreateSessionRequest The request for CreateSession.
Google::Spanner::V1::DeleteSessionRequest The request for DeleteSession.
Google::Spanner::V1::ExecuteSqlRequest The request for ExecuteSql and ExecuteStreamingSql.
Google::Spanner::V1::ExecuteSqlRequest::QueryMode Mode in which the query must be processed.
Google::Spanner::V1::GetSessionRequest The request for GetSession.
Google::Spanner::V1::KeyRange KeyRange represents a range of rows in a table or index.
Google::Spanner::V1::KeySet +KeySet+ defines a collection of Cloud Spanner keys and/or key ranges.
Google::Spanner::V1::Mutation A modification to one or more Cloud Spanner rows.
Google::Spanner::V1::Mutation::Delete Arguments to Delete operations.
Google::Spanner::V1::Mutation::Write Arguments to Insert, Update, Insert_or_update, and Replace operations.
Google::Spanner::V1::PartialResultSet Partial results from a streaming read or SQL query.
Google::Spanner::V1::PlanNode Node information for nodes appearing in a QueryPlan#plan_nodes.
Google::Spanner::V1::PlanNode::ChildLink Metadata associated with a parent-child relationship appearing in a PlanNode.
Google::Spanner::V1::PlanNode::Kind The kind of PlanNode.
Google::Spanner::V1::PlanNode::ShortRepresentation Condensed representation of a node and its subtree.
Google::Spanner::V1::QueryPlan Contains an ordered list of nodes appearing in the query plan.
Google::Spanner::V1::ReadRequest The request for Read and StreamingRead.
Google::Spanner::V1::ResultSet Results from Read or ExecuteSql.
Google::Spanner::V1::ResultSetMetadata Metadata about a ResultSet or PartialResultSet.
Google::Spanner::V1::ResultSetStats Additional statistics about a ResultSet or PartialResultSet.
Google::Spanner::V1::RollbackRequest The request for Rollback.
Google::Spanner::V1::Session A session in the Cloud Spanner API.
Google::Spanner::V1::Transaction A transaction.
Google::Spanner::V1::TransactionOptions = Transactions

Each session can have at most one active transaction at a time.
Google::Spanner::V1::TransactionOptions::ReadOnly Options for read-only transactions.
Google::Spanner::V1::TransactionOptions::ReadWrite Options for read-write transactions.
Google::Spanner::V1::TransactionSelector This message is used to select the transaction in which a Read or ExecuteSql call runs.

Google::Iam::V1

Class Description
Google::Iam::V1::Binding Associates +members+ with a +role+.
Google::Iam::V1::BindingDelta One delta entry for Binding.
Google::Iam::V1::BindingDelta::Action The type of action performed on a Binding in a policy.
Google::Iam::V1::Policy Defines an Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy.
Google::Iam::V1::PolicyDelta The difference delta between two policies.

Google::Protobuf

Class Description
Google::Protobuf::Any +Any+ contains an arbitrary serialized protocol buffer message along with a URL that describes the type of the serialized message.
Google::Protobuf::Duration A Duration represents a signed, fixed-length span of time represented as a count of seconds and fractions of seconds at nanosecond resolution.
Google::Protobuf::FieldMask +FieldMask+ represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:

paths: "f.a"
paths: "f.b.d"

Here +f+ represents a field in some root message, +a+ and +b+ fields in the message found in +f+, and +d+ a field found in the message in +f.b+.
Google::Protobuf::ListValue +ListValue+ is a wrapper around a repeated field of values.
Google::Protobuf::NullValue +NullValue+ is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the +Value+ type union.
Google::Protobuf::Struct +Struct+ represents a structured data value, consisting of fields which map to dynamically typed values.
Google::Protobuf::Timestamp A Timestamp represents a point in time independent of any time zone or calendar, represented as seconds and fractions of seconds at nanosecond resolution in UTC Epoch time.
Google::Protobuf::Value +Value+ represents a dynamically typed value which can be either null, a number, a string, a boolean, a recursive struct value, or a list of values.

Google::Rpc

Class Description
Google::Rpc::Status The +Status+ type defines a logical error model that is suitable for different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs.
